groupers.title: Groupers
groupers.description:
Index(es) and/or column(s) to group by, along with
            optional display names and help text.

patrol_type.title: Patrol Type
patrol_type.description: list of UUID of patrol types

index_name.title: Index Name
index_name.description: A name for the new index which will be added.

time_col.title: Time Col
time_col.description: Name of existing column containing time data.

directive.title: Directive
directive.description: A directive for formatting the time data.

cast_to_datetime.title: Cast To Datetime
cast_to_datetime.description: Whether to attempt casting `time_col` to datetime.

format.title: Format
format.description:
If `cast_to_datetime=True`, the format to pass to `pd.to_datetime`
            when attempting to cast `time_col` to datetime. Defaults to "mixed".

input_column_name.title: Input Column Name
input_column_name.description: The name of the column with categorical values.

colormap.title: Colormap
colormap.description: Either a named mpl.colormap or a list of string hex values.

output_column_name.title: Output Column Name
output_column_name.description: The dataframe column that will contain the color values.

tile_layer.title: Tile Layer
tile_layer.description: A named tile layer, ie OpenStreetMap.

static.title: Static
static.description: Set to true to disable map pan/zoom.

north_arrow_style.title: North Arrow Style
north_arrow_style.description: Additional arguments for configuring the North Arrow.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description:
Optional filename to persist text to within the `root_path`.
            If not provided, a filename will be generated based on a hash of the text content.

x_axis.title: X Axis
x_axis.description: The dataframe column to plot in the x/time axis.

y_axis.title: Y Axis
y_axis.description: The dataframe column to plot in the y axis.

category.title: Category
category.description: The dataframe column to stack in the y axis.

agg_function.title: Agg Function
agg_function.description: The aggregate function to apply to the group.

time_interval.title: Time Interval
time_interval.description: Sets the time interval of the x axis.

color_column.title: Color Column
color_column.description: The name of the dataframe column to color bars with.

grouped_styles.title: Grouped Styles
grouped_styles.description: Style arguments passed to plotly.graph_objects.Bar and applied to individual groups.

plot_style.title: Plot Style
plot_style.description: Additional style kwargs passed to go.Bar().

filename.title: Filename
filename.description:
Optional filename to persist text to within the `root_path`.
            If not provided, a filename will be generated based on a hash of the text content.

cell_width.title: Cell Width
cell_width.description: The width of a grid cell in meters.

cell_height.title: Cell Height
cell_height.description: The height of a grid cell in meters.

intersecting_only.title: Intersecting Only
intersecting_only.description: Whether to return only grid cells intersecting with the aoi.

geometry_type.title: Geometry Type
geometry_type.description: The geometry type of the provided geodataframe

input_column_name.title: Input Column Name
input_column_name.description: The name of the column with categorical values.

colormap.title: Colormap
colormap.description: Either a named mpl.colormap or a list of string hex values.

output_column_name.title: Output Column Name
output_column_name.description: The dataframe column that will contain the color values.

tile_layer.title: Tile Layer
tile_layer.description: A named tile layer, ie OpenStreetMap.

static.title: Static
static.description: Set to true to disable map pan/zoom.

north_arrow_style.title: North Arrow Style
north_arrow_style.description: Additional arguments for configuring the North Arrow.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description:
Optional filename to persist text to within the `root_path`.
            If not provided, a filename will be generated based on a hash of the text content.

tile_layer.title: Tile Layer
tile_layer.description: A named tile layer, ie OpenStreetMap.

static.title: Static
static.description: Set to true to disable map pan/zoom.

north_arrow_style.title: North Arrow Style
north_arrow_style.description: Additional arguments for configuring the North Arrow.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description:
Optional filename to persist text to within the `root_path`.
            If not provided, a filename will be generated based on a hash of the text content.

value_column.title: Value Column
value_column.description: The name of the dataframe column to pull slice values from.

label_column.title: Label Column
label_column.description: The name of the dataframe column to label slices with, required if the data in value_column is numeric.

color_column.title: Color Column
color_column.description: The name of the dataframe column to color slices with.

plot_style.title: Plot Style
plot_style.description: Additional style kwargs passed to go.Pie().

filename.title: Filename
filename.description:
Optional filename to persist text to within the `root_path`.
            If not provided, a filename will be generated based on a hash of the text content.

geometry_type.title: Geometry Type
geometry_type.description: The geometry type of the provided geodataframe

input_column_name.description: The name of the column with categorical values.

colormap.title: Colormap
